name: Corset of the Vishkanya
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Vishkanyas/New Racial Rules/Vishkanya Magic Items/Corset of the Vishkanya

Construction.Requirements: Craft Wondrous Item, grease, squeeze (see below)

sections.body: This black corset fits neatly beneath armor. As a free action, the wearer can compress herself to fit through tight spaces as though affected by a squeeze spell for up to 10 rounds per day. While using the corset's magic, she gains a +5 bonus on Escape Artist checks.
sections.name: Description
